about:
My name is Thiago Quaglia. Since I was young, I've been very passionate about technology, which led me to choose programming when I started my studies.

Currently, I'm about to finish my degree as a University Systems Analyst.

I'm looking for my first work experience in the software development field, which allows me to gain new knowledge and deepen what I've already learned.
